reviewText: I bought this for my wife and she absolutely loves it.  I must admit that it can suck you in a bit too.
I enjoyed watching the show. It's different than watching it on demand. You get the entire show...good and bad language. I hate to hear beep beep beep when you watch it on tv
i just love the girls next door. will never get tired of them and really miss this show. i wish it would have never ended. no one can replace these 3 lovely ladies or the show

Not racy, spicy, revealing in any sense. Unless you want
to make a case for the Dumb Blonde Syndrome. (I'm from
Minnesota; plenty of blonde's there; all genius's compared
to these play mates.)

Actually, kinda tame/lame and sad; destroys alota illusions.
